description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. For too long they have mocked you. For too long have you been the accompaniment of some luke-warm fries and an obligatory soft-drink. Now it is time to make the human race pay for it's indiscretions against your meaty goodness.  Sucks when you get vaporised by the lazer eyes of a psychopathic fast-food product from space... oh wellz....
